page.title: 07LOCAL SUPERSTITIONS
page.content: In Frant there is a village hall where many functions and parties take place. There are two main rooms in the hall,one large and one small.In the small room there is a picture of an old lady seated in a rocking chair knitting.People say that she moves and rocks to and fro in her chair. They say that she hates children,parties and people enjoying themselves.It's a horrible picture to hang on the wall because most of the things that happen in the hall are for enjoyment. As well as the story of the old lady people also say that the hall is haunted but I don't believe either of these stories.
